articles.content: The Medium is a game of two halves - a game where you, playing as Marianne, dart between the world of the living and the dead. This distinct split is a defining factor of the story telling, the produ… [+8670 chars]

articles.author: Clare Duffy, CNN Business
articles.title: Microsoft patented a chatbot that would let you talk to dead people. It was too disturbing for production - CNN
articles.description: The internet is buzzing over a new technology created by Microsoft developers that could make it possible to have a virtual conversation with a deceased loved one (well, kind of).

articles.author: Adrian Diaconescu
articles.title: Sony's latest Android 11 update might make a few Samsung fans jealous - PhoneArena
articles.description: Sony is doing something that even heavyweight software support champion Samsung hasn't done yet, delivering an official Android 11 update to a mid-range smartphone.
